name: SciTE
description: SciTE is a free open-source editor. It supports syntax highlighting of C, C++, PHP, C#, Perl, Html, CSS, java, Ruby and other languages. You can export files of PDF, HTML, RTF, XML, LaTex and other types by it.

en_US.description: SciTE is a free open-source editor. It supports syntax highlighting of C, C++, PHP, C#, Perl, Html, CSS, java, Ruby and other languages. You can export files of PDF, HTML, RTF, XML, LaTex and other types by it.
en_US.name: SciTE

zh_CN.description: SciTE是一款免费开源的编辑器，支持C、C++、PHP、C#、Perl、Html、CSS、java、Ruby等语言的语法高亮显示，还可以导出PDF/HTML/RTF/XML/LaTex等类型文件。
zh_CN.name: SciTE
